name: Share of energy from cereals, roots and tubers - FAO (2017)
title: Share of energy from cereals, roots and tubers - FAO (2017)
description: This data details the average share of dietary energy supplied by cereals, roots or tuber food commodities. It is often used as a key indicator of dietary diversity, with individuals at lower-income levels relying on cereals, roots and tubers for a high percentage of total energy intake (indicating poor dietary diversity).
